trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Spanaway
There were no other sightings in Spanaway on or around July 4th 2013
Summary: Two red/orange orbs in sky during 4th of July that hovered and changed direction.
divs: sighting detailswe had just arrived home from attending a fireworks display. my husband carried our son inside, and i was taking some blankets out of the back of our suv. for some reason, i looked up at the sky and saw one large red\orange orb floating through the sky coming from the left. at first, i thought it was fireworks, but the light didn't go away. it would glide through the sky, hover for a few seconds, then change directions slightly and move again. then, the light grew larger and very bright, and darted across the sky (to the right). i then noticed there was a second orb that behaved like the first. i watched the lights for about five to ten minutes, then they took off and i lost sight of them.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
